headline: Birmingham City Women sign Northern Ireland international Rebecca McKenna
summary: Birmingham City have signed 23-year-old Northern Ireland international Rebecca McKenna on a two-year deal from Championship rivals Charlton Athletic. McKenna has 43 caps for her country and featured in all Charlton’s 22 league matches last […]

headline: Filippa Angeldahl joins Real Madrid after exit from Man City Women
summary: Sweden international midfielder Filippa Angeldahl has signed for Real Madrid following her departure from Manchester City. The 26-year-old played 44 times over three seasons for Manchester City, with whom she won the Continental Tyres League […]

headline: Mary Earps completes move to PSG Women
summary: Paris Saint-Germain have signed England goalkeeper Mary Earps on a two-year contract after her departure from Manchester United. In five seasons with the Red Devils, she made almost 100 appearances in all competitions and won […]

headline: West Ham Women’s new signing Shekiera Martinez loaned to Freiburg
summary: West Ham United have signed 22-year-old Shekiera Martinez on a three-year contract after she spent the last eight with Eintracht Frankfurt. But she will spend next season on loan at SC Freiburg, in order to gain […]

headline: Anna Moorhouse receives her first Lionesses call-up
summary: An England squad update has been issued as they arrive in the Netherlands today for a training camp ahead of important UEFA EURO 2025 qualifiers. Orlando Pride’s 6′ 1” goalkeeper Anna Moorhouse will join the squad […]

headline: Brighton Women bring in Dutch defender Marisa Olislagers
summary: Brighton & Hove Albion’s first summer signing is Netherlands international Marisa Olislagers from FC Twente. The 23-year-old former Den Haag player joined Twente in 2020, going on to win nine domestic trophies with them, including […]

headline: West Ham Women capture Poland keeper Kinga Szemik
summary: West Ham United have signed 27-year-old Poland international goalkeeper Kinga Szemik from French side Stade de Reims on a three-year contract. Six-foot tall Szemik helped Poland win promotion to UEFA Women’s Nations League A last […]

headline: Alsu Abdullina and Reanna Blades leave Chelsea Women
summary: Russian international Alsu Abdullina and England U-19’s Reanna Blades have both left Chelsea at the end of their contracts. Abdullina joined Chelsea from Lokomotiv Moscow for the second half of the 2021/22 campaign and made […]

headline: Lucy Shepherd joins Dallas Trinity as 13 depart Blackburn Rovers Women
summary: Lucy Shepherd, one of 13 players departing Blackburn Rovers at the end of their contracts, signs for USL Super League side Dallas Trinity. Shepherd signed for the Championship side last season from London City Lionesses […]

headline: Reading withdraw from Barclays Women’s Championship
summary: Reading have confirmed their withdrawal from the Barclays Women’s Championship and will instead play in the fifth tier. In a club statement, Reading FC said: ‘To continue to operate at Barclays Women’s Championship level, the […]
